overview.title: Product Overview
overview.name: GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum
overview.summary: GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum with 10% Vitamin C is Oily, Combination

benefits.title: Key Benefits
benefits.summary: GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum offers multiple benefits including Brightening and Fades dark spots.

ingredients.title: Key Components
ingredients.description: Contains 2 key components: Vitamin C, Hyaluronic Acid

usage.title: How to Use
usage.instructions: Apply 2–3 drops in the morning before sunscreen
usage.recommendation: For best results: Apply 2–3 drops in the morning before sunscreen

safety.title: Safety Information
safety.warning: Note: Mild tingling for sensitive skin
